com.teamalasca.javassist

Class RequestDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • com.teamalasca.requestdispatcher.RequestDispatcher
        • com.teamalasca.javassist.RequestDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestDispatcherManagementI, fr.upmc.components.ComponentI, fr.upmc.datacenter.interfaces.PushModeControllerI, fr.upmc.datacenter.software.interfaces.RequestNotificationHandlerI, fr.upmc.datacenter.software.interfaces.RequestSubmissionHandlerI

    public class RequestDispatcher
extends RequestDispatcher
    The class RequestDispatcher (with Javassist) is a component receiving request submissions from a given application, and dispatching these requests to the different virtual machines allocated for this application.
    Author:
    Clément George, Mohamed Amine Corchi, Victor Nea
